name: xmtp-client-auth
description: Wallet-based authentication for interacting with the XMTP protocol

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm build:types && pnpm build:cjs && pnpm build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions ".ts,.js" --source-maps inline
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir dist/esm --extensions ".ts,.js" --source-maps inline

author: XMTP
